Release Notes for parson library

Purpose

Parson is a lighweight json library written in C.

Features:

  • Full JSON support
  • Lightweight (only 2 files)
  • Simple API
  • Addressing json values with dot notation (similar to C structs or objects in most OO languages, e.g. “objectA.objectB.value”)
  • C89 compatible
  • Test suites

For further details, open README.md and parson.

Update History

Main Changes

Maintenance release

  • Added custom functions for float format
  • Bug fixing
